title: Understanding ActiveX Controls
text: ActiveX controls are components used in software applications to provide interactive features. They can be buttons, text boxes, or other interactive elements.

title: Identifying Command Buttons
text: Command buttons are used to execute commands or actions when clicked. They are a common type of ActiveX control.

title: Recognizing Text Boxes
text: Text boxes allow users to input text data. They are another type of ActiveX control.

hintAnswer: two command buttons and a text box
title: Selecting the Correct ActiveX Controls
text: Based on the information about ActiveX controls, which combination of controls is correct?
choices: two command buttons and a text box
two text boxes and a command button
